knock.name: Knock
knock.description: Unlocks a mundane lock through force of magic.
knock.cast_message: {caster_name} utters a sharp word of command!

arcane_lock.name: Arcane Lock
arcane_lock.description: Magically seals a container, making it difficult to open.
arcane_lock.cast_message: {caster_name} traces a glowing seal in the air!
